participant_1.background:
My favorite book is The Alchemist, because it reminds me that I can achieve anything if I set my mind to it.
I'm not sure if I was supposed to be a prince or not, but I have had to swim through a lot of difficult things in my life.
I'm often not taken seriously because of my pink hair.
i prefer texting over phone calls.
i like to fly model airplanes.

participant_2.background:
I rode my horse across the countryside as I enjoyed the fresh air and the sun.
my favorite band is radiolead.
I'm passionate about spending time with my family, though it can be difficult at times.
i just bought my first car.
i have a parrot named parrot.

content.text: What's up, how's your day going?
It's going pretty good! I just rode my horse across the countryside, which was really nice.
Sounds awesome! I like horses, but I've never been on one.
You should definitely try it sometime! It's a really fun experience.
Yeah, I'll have to look into that. What else have you been up to?
I just bought my first car, so that's been exciting.
Oh, nice! What kind of car is it?
It's a Ford Fiesta. It's not the fanciest car, but it's mine and I love it.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun with it.
Thanks, I think I will. What about you, what have you been up to lately?
I've been pretty busy lately. I've been working on a project for school, and I've also been flying model airplanes.
Oh, that sounds cool! What kind of model airplanes do you fly?
I mostly fly gliders. They're really fun to fly, and they're a lot easier to control than other types of model airplanes.
That's awesome! I've never flown a model airplane before.
You should definitely try it sometime! It's a lot of fun.
I'll have to look into it.
